text: Armando Durim Sadiku (born 27 May 1991) is an Albanian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Indian Super League club Mohun Bagan SG and the Albania national team. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Albanian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players
title: Armando Sadiku
